$schema: Session Scope Configuration - Defines what areas agents can modify

_docs.core: boolean - If true, agents can modify core/ directory, app/ directory, scripts/, migrations/
_docs.theme: string|false - Theme name that agents can modify (e.g., 'default', 'crm'). Set to false to disallow theme modifications.
_docs.plugins: array|false - Array of plugin names agents can modify (e.g., ['analytics', 'payment']). Set to false to disallow plugin modifications.
_docs.exceptions: array - Array of specific file paths that are allowed/disallowed regardless of scope rules
